title: Stop Thinking When Using Command : clone_repository

labels.name: platform dependent
labels.description: When something works but not on all platforms

body:
### ⚠️ Search for existing issues first ⚠️

- [X] I have searched the existing issues, and there is no existing issue for my problem

### Which Operating System are you using?

MacOS

### Which version of Auto-GPT are you using?

Stable (branch)

### GPT-3 or GPT-4?

GPT-4

### Steps to reproduce 🕹

I asked Auto-GPT to summarize concepts related to transformer architecture from a website and perform translation. During the process, Auto-GPT decided to clone a project to facilitate the task.
### Current behavior 😯

Auto-GPT cloned the repository to the auto_gpt_workspace directory.

### Expected behavior 🤔

I expect the repository to be cloned successfully to the specified path.
Autogpt should continue my required tasks but it stops during cloning the repository and gives no any response.


### Your Logs 📒

```log
(env) vernunft@VernunftdeMacBook-Air Auto-GPT % python -m autogpt
NEWS:  Welcome to Auto-GPT! We'll keep you informed of the latest news and features by printing messages here. If you don't wish to see this message, you can run Auto-GPT with the --skip-news flag # INCLUDED COMMAND 'send_tweet' IS DEPRICATED, AND WILL BE REMOVED IN THE NEXT STABLE RELEASE Base Twitter functionality (and more) is now covered by plugins: https://github.com/Significant-Gravitas/Auto-GPT-Plugins ## Changes to Docker configuration The workdir has been changed from /home/appuser to /app. Be sure to update any volume mounts accordingly.
Welcome back!  Would you like me to return to being Explainer?
Continue with the last settings?
Name:  Explainer
Role:  expain the document about transformer architecture
Goals: ['browse https://jalammar.github.io/illustrated-transformer/', 'break down concepts in understandable peices', 'translate these results into accurate traditional chinese', 'output all your explain and translation into a file ', 'file should be stored in /Users/vernunft/Auto-GPT/auto_gpt_workspace']
Continue (y/n): y
Using memory of type:  LocalCache
Using Browser:  chrome
 THOUGHTS:  I suggest we start by browsing the website https://jalammar.github.io/illustrated-transformer/ to get a better understanding of the transformer architecture.
REASONING:  Browsing the website will give us a better understanding of the transformer architecture, which will help us break down the concepts into understandable pieces and translate them into accurate traditional Chinese.
PLAN: 
-  Browse the website https://jalammar.github.io/illustrated-transformer/
-  Break down the concepts into understandable pieces
-  Translate the concepts into accurate traditional Chinese
-  Output all explanations and translations into a file
CRITICISM:  I need to ensure that I am accurately translating the concepts into traditional Chinese and that I am breaking down the concepts into understandable pieces.
NEXT ACTION:  COMMAND = browse_website ARGUMENTS = {'url': 'https://jalammar.github.io/illustrated-transformer/', 'question': 'What is the transformer architecture?'}
Enter 'y' to authorise command, 'y -N' to run N continuous commands, 'n' to exit program, or enter feedback for ...
Input:y -5
-=-=-=-=-=-=-= COMMAND AUTHORISED BY USER -=-=-=-=-=-=-= 
[WDM] - Downloading: 100%|██████████████████| 8.04M/8.04M [00:17<00:00, 495kB/s]
SYSTEM:  Command browse_website returned: Error: [Errno 13] Permission denied: '/Users/vernunft/.wdm/drivers/chromedriver/mac_arm64/112.0.5615.49/driver.zip'
 THOUGHTS:  Let's use Google search to find a resource that explains the transformer architecture.
REASONING:  Google search will allow us to find a variety of resources that explain the transformer architecture, which will help us break down the concepts into understandable pieces and translate them into accurate traditional Chinese.

-  Output all explanations and translations into a file

NEXT ACTION:  COMMAND = google ARGUMENTS = {'input': 'transformer architecture explanation'}
SYSTEM:  Command google returned: ['https://towardsdatascience.com/illustrated-guide-to-transformers-step-by-step-explanation-f74876522bc0', 'https://jalammar.github.io/illustrated-transformer/', 'https://machinelearningmastery.com/the-transformer-model/', 'https://builtin.com/artificial-intelligence/transformer-neural-network', 'https://neptune.ai/blog/comprehensive-guide-to-transformers', 'https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Transformer_(machine_learning_model)', 'https://medium.com/inside-machine-learning/what-is-a-transformer-d07dd1fbec04', 'https://datagen.tech/guides/computer-vision/transformer-architecture/']

This website provides a step-by-step explanation of the transformer architecture, which will help us break down the concepts into understandable pieces and translate them into accurate traditional Chinese.
